recipe.title: Strawberry Daiquiri Slush with Honeydew Melon
ingredients: 1/2 ripe honeydew melon, seeded and flesh cut into 1/2-inch cubes
instructions: Purée frozen berries, corn syrup, rum to taste, and lime juice in a blender until slushy. Spoon into 6 (8-ounce) wineglasses or other stemmed shallow glasses and top with melon.
Purée frozen berries, corn syrup, rum to taste, and lime juice in a blender until slushy. Spoon into 6 (8-ounce) wineglasses or other stemmed shallow glasses and top with melon.
